1. Daily Dose of Broccoli Sprout Extract Helps Blood Sugar, Study Shows  ScienceAlert
  2. Prediabetes: Broccoli sprout compound may lower blood sugar  Medical News Today
  3. Broccoli sprout compound can help fend off type 2 diabetes  New Atlas
  4. Lower blood glucose: Superfood shown to significantly reduce blood sugar - with greater effect in those with prediabetes  GB News
  5. Can broccoli sprout extract lower blood sugar?  The Financial Express
